commit.message:
Extract a Node abstraction in TitusRelocation service

so we can deal with Kubernetes nodes and Agent Management API
objects at the same time

nodes.bodyText:
these two methods (checkKubeConnectivity and mustHaveKubeConnectivity) are not being used anywhere here. Are they intended to be provided as a library?
The boolean return is also not being used anywhere (see comment below)
not checking the boolean return anywhere
minor: might be a bit more future-proof to use Boolean.parseBoolean() for all these bool attributes
thoughts on changing the contract here to return Optional<Long>, and be more explicit when sync has not occurred?
Precondition checks (notNull, notEmpty) would help here with id, serverGroupId
Could be more clear calling it out as FenzoNodeResolver ?
minor : could it be combined with the indexer -> stream -> filter expression above ?
